mapper.insert: insert into org (parent_id, org_name, org_type_id, area_id, contact_person, contact_phone, note , sort, is_deleted ) values(#{parentId},#{orgName},#{orgTypeId},#{areaId},#{countactPerson},#{countactPhone},#{note},#{sort},#{isDeleted});
